ROOT.TXT: SELECT ITEM, VENDOR, MH_NODE, W8_ACT, W7_ACT, W6_ACT, W5_ACT, W4_ACT, W3_ACT, W2_ACT, W1_ACT, W8_FCT, W7_FCT, W6_FCT, W5_FCT, W4_FCT, W3_FCT, W2_FCT, W1_FCT, ABS(W8_ACT-W8_FCT) AS ABS_W8, ABS(W7_ACT-W7_FCT) AS ABS_W7, ABS(W6_ACT-W6_FCT) AS ABS_W6, ABS(W5_ACT-W5_FCT) AS ABS_W5, ABS(W4_ACT-W4_FCT) AS ABS_W4, ABS(W3_ACT-W3_FCT) AS ABS_W3, ABS(W2_ACT-W2_FCT) AS ABS_W2, ABS(W1_ACT-W1_FCT) AS ABS_W1, ABS(W8_ACT-W8_FCT)+ABS(W7_ACT-W7_FCT)+ABS(W6_ACT-W6_FCT)+ABS(W5_ACT-W5_FCT) +ABS(W4_ACT-W4_FCT)+ABS(W3_ACT-W3_FCT)+ABS(W2_ACT-W2_FCT)+ABS(W1_ACT-W1_FCT) AS ERR_SUM, W8_ACT+W7_ACT+W6_ACT+W5_ACT+W4_ACT+W3_ACT+W2_ACT+W1_ACT AS ACT_SUM, W8_FCT+W7_FCT+W6_FCT+W5_FCT+W4_FCT+W3_FCT+W2_FCT+W1_FCT AS FCT_SUM FROM( SELECT DISTINCT PKARTRAC.Get_Artcexr(1,PKARTUL.getCinr(1,PVECINL)) AS ITEM, FOUCNUF AS VENDOR, SOBCEXT AS MH_NODE, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 8,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W8_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 7,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W7_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 6,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W6_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 5,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W5_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 4,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W4_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 3,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W3_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 2,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W2_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDREEL FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 1,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W1_ACT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 8,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W8_FCT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 7,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W7_FCT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 6,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W6_FCT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 5,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W5_FCT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 4,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W4_FCT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 3,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W3_FCT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 2,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W2_FCT, NVL((SELECT PVDCALC FROM FCTDETPVH WHERE PVDNSEM = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE - 7 * 1,'YYYYWW') AND PVDEID = PVEID ),0) AS W1_FCT FROM fctdetpvh, FCTENTPVH, ARTUC, FOUDGENE, STRUCOBJ, ARTRAC WHERE PVESITE = :PARAM_SITE: AND PVEID = PVDEID AND PKARTUL.getCinr(1,PVECINL) = ARACINR AND (ARTCEXR = ':PARAM_ITEM:' OR ':PARAM_ITEM:' = '-1') AND ARACINR = ARTCINR AND SYSDATE BETWEEN ARADDEB AND ARADFIN AND PKSITDGENE.get_siteclass(1,ARASITE) = 0 AND ARACFIN = FOUCFIN AND (FOUCNUF = ':PARAM_VENDOR:' OR ':PARAM_VENDOR:' = '-1' ) AND SOBCINT = PKSTRUCREL.GET_CINT_PERE(1,1,PKARTUL.getCinr(1,PVECINL),SYSDATE) AND PVECINL NOT IN (SELECT alearg1 FROM FCTALERT F WHERE F.ALESITE = :PARAM_SITE: AND F.ALEUTIL = 'psfct01p' AND F.ALEMESS = 'Model : No forecasts')) ORDER BY VENDOR, ITEM
